scope.goal: Develop a simple, responsive landing page for TestApp to showcase its purpose and drive user engagement. This addresses the pain point of no dedicated online presence, making it easier to attract visitors and provide essential product information without complex navigation.

tech_stack.frontend: Next.js 14+ App Router + TS + Tailwind + Shadcn

features: Hero section with compelling headline, subtext, and call-to-action button using Shadcn components
About section describing TestApp's value proposition with cards from UI database
Features list in a grid layout highlighting key benefits
Simple contact form using React Hook Form + Zod for validation
Footer with links and copyright info
comps: Carrd (quick no-code builds / lacks custom code flexibility for branding)
Webflow (visual design power / overkill and costly for static landing pages)
scope.outcome: Live repo on localhost:3000 + Vercel URL + 80% test coverage

in_scope: Research existing UI components in database
Implementation of static page with responsive layout
milestones: M1: Research done and components selected from database
M2: Design specs and wireframes approved
M3: MVP deployed on localhost:3000 and Vercel
risks: Limited component matches in database (mitigate by querying MCP tool first)
Scope creep on design (stick to simple layout)
